## Buttons

### Primary Buttons

```html|span-3
<style type="text/css">
  button {
    margin: 10px;
  }
</style>

  Small Primary/Default Button
</button>
<button class="s-button">Normal Primary/Default Button</button>
<button class="s-button" disabled>
  Normal Primary/Default Button, disabled
</button>
```

### Tertiary Buttons

```html|span-3
<button class="s-button s-button--tertiary s-button--small">
  Small Tertiary Button
</button>

  Normal Tertiary Button, disabled
</button>

        d="M50,16.668 C31.668,16.668 16.668,31.668 16.668,50 C16.668,68.332 31.668,83.332 50,83.332 C68.332,83.332 83.332,68.332 83.332,50 C83.332,31.668 68.332,16.668 50,16.668 L50,16.668 Z M74.793,46.875 L66.461,46.875 C66.04303,42.5 64.168,34.168 58.336,26.457 C67.0821,29.582 73.543,37.5 74.793,46.875 Z M52.082,25.625 C59.375,33.125 61.664,42.293 62.289,46.875 L52.082,46.875 L52.082,25.625 Z M47.9179,46.875 L37.7109,46.875 C38.3359,42.293 40.4179,33.125 47.9179,25.625 L47.9179,46.875 Z M47.9179,53.125 L47.9179,74.375 C40.6249,66.875 38.3359,57.707 37.7109,53.125 L47.9179,53.125 Z M52.082,53.125 L62.289,53.125 C61.664,57.707 59.582,66.875 52.082,74.375 L52.082,53.125 Z M41.668,26.457 C35.836,34.164 34.168,42.5 33.543,46.875 L25.211,46.875 C26.4571,37.5 32.918,29.582 41.668,26.457 Z M25.207,53.125 L33.539,53.125 C33.95697,57.5 35.832,65.832 41.664,73.543 C32.9179,70.418 26.457,62.5 25.207,53.125 L25.207,53.125 Z M58.332,73.543 C64.164,65.836 65.832,57.5 66.457,53.125 L74.789,53.125 C73.5429,62.5 67.082,70.418 58.332,73.543 L58.332,73.543 Z"
        id="Shape"
        stroke="none"
        fill="currentColor"
        fill-rule="nonzero"
      ></path>
    </svg>
    Normal Tertiary Button with Icon inside
  </span>
</button>
<button class="s-button s-button--tertiary s-button--big">
  Big Tertiary Button
</button>
```
